postReview.title: Crystal Palace 2-2 Leicester City: Mateta brace rescues point for hosts
postReview.description: Jean-Philippe Mateta's brace, including an injury-time penalty, rescued a point for Crystal Palace as they drew 2-2 with Leicester.

preReview.title: Mateta has 'moved on' after Crystal Palace refused to sell
preReview.description: Jean-Philippe Mateta was open to leaving Crystal Palace in the summer, but the Eagles refused to sell the striker.

QAData.question: Who won between Crystal Palace and Leicester City on Sat, 14 Sep 2024 14:00:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: Crystal Palace vs Leicester City on Sat, 14 Sep 2024 14:00:00 GMT ended in a 2–2 tie.
